entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Clarenville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind west 20 km/h except gusting to 40 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13 except minus 7 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
